The PsychGen Centre is an interdisciplinary research environment dedicated to advancing knowledge about mental health. This wiki contains information related to project specific information on using data in p471 on TSD.

To learn more about the PsychGen center: <https://www.fhi.no/en/me/the-psychgen-centre-for-genetic-epidemiology-and-mental-health/>
